items.title: White House’s Hassett says Fed Needs to be Fully Independent From Trump
items.description: Former Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook has sued to challenge her removal by President Trump.

items.title: U.S. to Target More Businesses After Hyundai Raid, Top Official Says
items.description: Many of the 475 workers arrested during an ICE raid of a Hyundai factory in Georgia had ‘expired or tourist visas,’ the federal agency alleges.

items.title: South Korea Has Finished Talks With U.S. to Release Korean Workers
items.description: Federal agents detained Korean workers at a Hyundai factory in Georgia over their visas.

items.title: Volkswagen Unveils Compact Electric SUV
items.description: The German car company released a more affordable option to stay competitive amid U.S. tariffs.

items.title: The Impact of Empowering Employees With Internal Side Hustles
items.description: Employees who feel underutilized will either build value for you or for someone else.
